survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Work Policy Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on their satisfaction and challenges regarding the current hybrid work policy, to help improve workplace flexibility and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid work policy at your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measurable satisfaction metrics. Ensure mobile-friendly display of radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current hybrid work policy at your organization?

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face with the hybrid work policy? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection for comprehensive feedback. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face with the hybrid work policy? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you prefer to work remotely under the hybrid policy?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. This helps gauge employee preferences for remote work frequency.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you prefer to work remotely under the hybrid policy?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the hybrid work policy?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly and allows for lengthy responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the hybrid work policy?

questions.question_text: Do you feel adequately supported by your manager in a hybrid work setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived support. Helps identify gaps in managerial practices.
